page.title: 14 Communications in Wellow
page.content: The main road in this area is the A36. It is a major road and the amount of traffic it carries is considerable, making it hazardous to even walk on the single pavement.It would be better if the road was made into a dual carriage way.This road goes from Southampton to Salisbury with many minor roads branching from it, linking Canada and Wellow to the A36.These are also very busy;many of the roads have a pavement on one side only.Some of the out lying areas are linked by footpaths and bridleways.Many of these are signposted.Some paths are very overgrown through lack of use and are hard to walk along.Because they are not used frequently some stiles were in a dangerous condition. Generally,Wellow is well served by roads. By Janice Medley.
